name: Omar Farooq
story: Omar started designing from his bedroom, built a strong portfolio, and now leads projects at CreativeLabs, inspiring juniors with creativity and dedication daily.

name: Ahmed Saeed
story: Ahmed taught himself Python online, cracked tough interviews, and now analyzes big data trends that shape company strategies at DataWave.

name: Bilal Hussain
story: Bilal transitioned from system admin to DevOps after earning certifications, and now streamlines deployments for a global client base at CloudWorks.

name: Yusuf Kamal
story: Yusuf mastered Node.js and databases during nights after work. Today, he leads backend architecture for scalable apps at CodeCrafters.

name: Imran Tariq
story: Imran built his cybersecurity skills through open-source contributions and landed his dream job protecting enterprise networks at SecureNet.

name: Ali Raza
story: Ali switched from teaching to tech, learned Java, and now contributes to major enterprise software development at NextGenTech.

name: Hassan Qureshi
story: Hassan earned AWS certifications and built cloud systems from scratch. Now, he designs infrastructure for global apps at SkyNet Solutions.

name: Salman Javed
story: Salman combined tech experience with business skills, became a certified Scrum Product Owner, and now drives innovation at BrightLogic.

name: Tariq Mehmood
story: Tariq rose from QA engineer to project manager by improving processes and earning trust. He now leads successful tech teams at DigitalFlow.
